scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker volume rm -f g16-debtmate_postgres_data && docker rmi -f postgres:16 && docker system prune -af --volumes
scripts.docker:postgres: docker exec -it debtmate-postgres psql -U admin -d debtmate
scripts.docker:list-tables: docker-compose up -d && docker exec -it debtmate-postgres psql -U admin -d debtmate -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema='public' ORDER BY table_name;"
scripts.docker:list-users: docker-compose up -d && docker exec -it debtmate-postgres psql -U admin -d debtmate -c "SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY id;"
scripts.dev:memory: npm run setup && cross-env DB_MODE=memory concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run server"
scripts.dev:postgres: npm run setup && cross-env DB_MODE=postgres concurrently "npm run docker:up" "npm run dev" "npm run server"
